hero.heading: Optimized maintenance: corrective, preventive and predictive in one place.
hero.subheading: EAM One integrates maintenance management with SAP Business One so you can plan and control your assets with full traceability and data-driven decisions.

value_props.title: Integration with SAP Business One
value_props.text: EAM One natively integrates maintenance management with the procurement and warehouse processes of SAP Business One.

value_props.title: Developed under SAP standards
value_props.text: EAM One is a web application developed according to SAP standards and recommendations, with a model designed to minimally interfere with each customer’s functional processes.

value_props.title: Hosted on Amazon Web Services (AWS)
value_props.text: Maintenance management data is stored in a dedicated space for each company on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform.

benefits.title: Reduced maintenance costs – Preventive maintenance
benefits.text: Through efficient planning and execution of preventive maintenance plans, failures can be anticipated and equipment lifespan extended. By reducing incidents that cause downtime, equipment uptime is maximized.

benefits.title: Real-time dashboard for ongoing and planned activities
benefits.text: Planners can monitor the entire maintenance process flow on their dashboard, such as scheduled work orders, pending tasks, and open maintenance requests.

benefits.title: Integration with third-party systems
benefits.text: Thanks to a powerful API, EAM One can integrate with external systems, such as vehicle control systems. This allows automatic loading of counters, which act as potential triggers for maintenance requests from preventive maintenance plans.
